item.title: Taking it up a notch with my standing desk with fluidstance
item.description: I have been standing at work for the past 2 years. And I have seen significant improvement with respect to my productivity and non-drowsiness with standing desk. The one draw back with that I have seen was standing in a position where I put a lot of stress on one of the legs. And I wanted ti try something different. Thatâ€™s when I saw fluidstance. Bought myself one which brings in a new challenge.
